Text.Page: Goddess Velik, the guardian deity of Velika, wished to see you. You answered Priestess Ciebel's short questions, then were granted an audience with Velik. She warned you of a hidden threat to Velika and asked for your aid.

Mission Orders

Return to Velika at once and report to General Samael. All other orders are rescinded.

Ah, . It seems that Velik herself would like to reward you for the work you've done here.

{@LinkCreature:63#1167#Velik's Priestess Ciebel} is waiting for you near the idol of the goddess. I suggest you not keep her waiting.

, at last. What sort of soldier are you? Velik is seeking soldiers who are capable of more than simple obedience to orders. The Valkyon Federation needs champions—more than it might realize.

Are you a dutiful follower or an independent thinker?"A dutiful thinker."

Excellent answer! Well said.

There is, perhaps, a deeper need for those such as yourself than any realize just yet. Our world is coming to a turning point. How will the Dream take shape?

It will be soldiers like you who shall decide.

Thank you, . A most pleasant chat.

Velik will see you now.

We meet at last, . I've watched your brief, but illustrious, career. You've served with courage, honor, and, most importantly, compassion.

I have need of soldiers like you.

You've returned. Remember what the goddess said to you. You must defend the city—and the Dream itself.

Return now to Samael. Farewell.
Have you met the goddess?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I have."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

You should be humbled. She doesn't meet with just anyone, you know.

She must see something special in you.

I wonder what. Hah!
